entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
